item.title: Alexis Ohanian’s Next Social Platform Has One Rule: Don’t Act Like an Asshole
item.description: The Reddit cofounder joins WIRED’s “Uncanny Valley” podcast and opens up about his early days in tech, his plans for Digg, the future of women’s sports, and what his immigrant mom taught him about Ame

item.title: Alexis Ohanian’s Next Social Platform Has One Rule: Don’t Act Like an Asshole
item.description: The Reddit cofounder joins WIRED’s “Uncanny Valley” podcast and opens up about his early days in tech, his plans for Digg, the future of women’s sports, and what his immigrant mom taught him about Ame

item.title: Lisa Su Runs AMD—and Is Out for Nvidia’s Blood
item.description: While everyone else has been talking about Nvidia’s GPUs, Lisa Su has discreetly turned AMD into a chipmaking phenom. And as the US-China tech war rages, she’s at the center of it all.

item.title: Lisa Su Runs AMD—and Is Out for Nvidia’s Blood

item.title: Bryan Johnson Is Going to Die
item.description: Millions of dollars in treatments, supplements, and scans. Immortality through AI. Bryan Johnson’s longevity script has everything—except an ending.
